controls.title: Ensure SELinux is not disabled in bootloader configuration
controls.description: Verify SELinux is not disabled via boot parameters

controls.title: Ensure SELinux policy is configured
controls.description: Verify SELinux policy is set to targeted or mls

controls.title: Ensure the SELinux mode is not disabled
controls.remediation: Edit /etc/selinux/config and set SELINUX=enforcing or SELINUX=permissive
controls.description: Verify SELinux is in enforcing or permissive mode

controls.title: Ensure the SELinux mode is enforcing
controls.description: Verify SELinux is in enforcing mode

controls.title: Ensure no unconfined services exist
controls.remediation: Investigate unconfined processes and confine them appropriately
controls.description: Verify no unconfined services are running

controls.title: Ensure SETroubleshoot is not installed
controls.description: Verify setroubleshoot package is not installed

controls.title: Ensure the MCS Translation Service (mcstrans) is not installed
controls.description: Verify mcstrans package is not installed
